Home » 14S5 Mahāvaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 4 Indriyasaṃyutta » 4.6 Sūkarakhatavagga
4.6.9 Paṭhamauppādasutta
Indriyasaṃyutta
Sūkarakhatavagga
Paṭhamauppādasutta
529.
1222Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, indriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni anuppannāni uppajjanti, nāññatra tathāgatassa pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassa. Katamāni pañca? Saddhindriyaṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ, satindriyaṃ, samādhindriyaṃ, paññindriyaṃ—  imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcindriyāni bhāvitāni bahulīkatāni anuppannāni uppajjanti, nāññatra tathāgatassa pātubhāvā arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti.
1223Navamaṃ.
